website_summaries.verdict: The Motorola Droid RAZR is Verizon's classiest, most powerful smartphone for now, but it may be quickly outpaced by competitors.
pros: Ultra-powerful and fast, especially for media
Optional docks turn the phone into a PC
cons: Camera doesn't perform as well as the competition

customer_reviews.title: It was ok with Android ICS
customer_reviews.text: The phone is pretty, has a great camera and good screen and was relatively fast with Ice Cream Sandwich. Then I updated it to Jelly Bean and I fully regret it. The phone is a pain to use, slower than many lower end smartphones out there, to the point where it becomes useless. Also the 3,5 mm jack stopped working after a couple of months. UPDATE: The phone has become a nightmare to use, to the point that many times I can't ever answer calls. I've done almost everything and this is just unacceptable. I imagine doing a rollback to ICS or using a moded Kitkat firmware would make this a good phone, but it's too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Hernán

customer_reviews.title: five star to one star
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review from a five star to a one star. I got this phone, in "used-very good condition" for my boyfriend a few weeks ago. He went to plug it into the usb port to listen to music in his car AND THE CORD JUST WIGGLED AROUND FREELY, AS IF THE INSIDES OF THE USB PORT HAD BEEN TAKEN OUT!? Needless to say he cant play music in his car off this phone. At all. Otherwise it arrived on time, no cosmetic damage, but how crappy and dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: Megan RR

customer_reviews.title: Crawled till it froze
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone as a temporary replacement until I was due for my next upgrade. It has extremely limited memory and I had to force stop or delete many of the installed apps so that I would have more working RAM as you cannot add more. It sped up slightly but crawled when I went on Facebook and the screens took way too long to change. Within 1 week it froze and I had to return it to Amazon. It was the absolute worst cell phone I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Moses Powell

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase! Phone was exactly as advertised...minor scratches on the case, but the screen and software are in as-new condition. Battery is also in perfect condition - this was a big concern of mine since the battery in this phone cannot be easily replaced. Phone actually works better than the same phone that it is replacing (I broke mine.) Seller obviously wiped the phone and re-installed the "factory" software and settings. Couldn't be more pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: thatguy

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies sooo fast.
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself isn't bad. I bought it as a back up after my iphone broke until I could get an upgrade. Not sure if the batter sucks because it's used, or not. Either way, the battery only makes it through half the day before it's completely dead. I was bummed to find out I couldn't easily replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: You could tell where they didn't quit get the rear case re-attached quite right but seems to work OK. Update: The phone did not even last a year. This was not a case of accident nor abuse. We are in our late 50's and take care of our items.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst phone I have ever owned. Thought I would switch over from iPhone for a change, terrible idea! Phone screen SHATTERED after it fell of my bed onto CARPET. Not to mention it was always lagging an unresponsive. Worst 95$ I ever spent. Don't buy unless you love terrible products.
customer_reviews.author: MARC FELICIANO

customer_reviews.title: I was very upset and disappointed. I definitely learn my lesson in buying electronics ...
customer_reviews.text: This was awful after 3wks it totally stop working and charging. I was very upset and disappointed. I definitely learn my lesson in buying electronics on line. I would rather go to the store and pay a little extra for something I know is going to work and easy for me to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa H.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible lag from day one
customer_reviews.text: Terrible lag from day one, and it only gets worse! And the swipe doesn't work. Would not recommend, from the comments it seems like you've got a fifty-fifty shot at getting a decent phone.
customer_reviews.author: Josette

customer_reviews.title: Not an exact replacement
customer_reviews.text: It is the same RAZR model that I had before but it has an updated operating system that I do not like. For example every time it is turned on you have to unlock it which is a pain. There may be a way to override that feature but I have not found it yet. Then there are a lot of little things that I had to relearn, just little things on how to find things that are different. So it was like getting a new type of phone, so there was a learning curve that I was not expecting, but now I am use to it and enjoying the android smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the worst phone I have ever purchased on the after-market. It's glitchy to no end. I really can't say much about it that is good. I already have to look for another option.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Davis

customer_reviews.title: I like my Motorola Razor
customer_reviews.text: this Motorola RAZR has given me everything I need in the Droid phone system. It's easy to use and has many useful apps I've been able to download.I really recommend Android phones
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: The shipper was great but the phone, no fault of his is not that great. Unless you live in a strong area near a pole, this phone can not even pick up the 3G signal. I have had 4G that worked fine, but this one is weak. Staying with my IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Got what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I havent had any problems yet with this product. The description was accurate of what I would be getting. It looks great and works well.
customer_reviews.author: nilat

customer_reviews.title: loved these phones
customer_reviews.text: I bough 3 of these over the years good phone but the screes are no longer in production so the price went up
customer_reviews.author: Casey the Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very, very Satisfied/Expectations Exceeded!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used Droid Razr and the product I received far exceeded my expectations. Not a scratch, dent, or ding and the phone fired up immediately. I was making calls within 5" of receiving the phone. Thanks Guys!
customer_reviews.author: James Eric Prizzia

customer_reviews.title: Regret
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this item. I've owned the same model phone previously and loved it. This phone was purchased as a replacement. doesn't make or receive phone calls on a regular basis. Well be contacting seller to resolve...hopefully
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusted
customer_reviews.text: The phone looked good, but unfortunately to our surprise the callers could not hear us. You can turn on the speaker but they can barely hear us. The phone texts fine. I looked into exchanging it but I had to write the seller, so they can approve a exchange or return. I NEVER HEARD FROM THEM!!! I WILL NEVER BUY FROM THAT SELLER AGAIN.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement value
customer_reviews.text: My son is hard on phones, and this was a terrific value as a replacement. The seller did an outstanding job too.
customer_reviews.author: nocboy

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is in perfect shape. The blemish you talked about on the outside corner was so small, I had to borrow my wifes glasses to see it. I have 20/20 vision. You must look at these under a big magnifying glass. Thank you, it was more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming as always w droids
customer_reviews.text: Same issues as every other droid I've owned. Pretty to look at w nice screen resolution. Wish it was as dependable as my iPhone.

customer_reviews.title: Upsetting
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the phone and does not work. Womt activate or stay on for that matter. Keeps turning off and on. Its also not the droid razr. Its a cheap imitation, you can tell by looking at it. And you stull got to deal with the crap of returning stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product

customer_reviews.title: malfunction with this one
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone but as soon as I was able to activate this phone the screen went out on me and I'm now only able to see 25%of the screen which really sucks because I really love the razr

customer_reviews.title: The battery had issues but that was only a 20 ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery had issues but that was only a 20 dollar repair. Very solid phone and should last years.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The phone looked like new, however It runs a bit slow. Fast shipping and it works as needed

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied, the item arrived more quickly than was scheduled
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied, the item arrived more quickly than was scheduled, the cellphone was as described "Brand New" ready to use, I've been a few weeks using it and works perfectly well.

customer_reviews.title: nice phone

customer_reviews.title: Razr
customer_reviews.text: Overall the phone was exactly what I expected except that when I plugged in my ear phone connector, the music continued to play through the external speaker instead of the ear buds like my previous RAZR. Sure miss using my ear buds....

customer_reviews.title: Decent Phone
customer_reviews.text: Decent replacement phone. Very thin. Performs well. Problem with charger provided not working well, not secure in port. I had to buy another charger and it seems to be working better now.

customer_reviews.title: great shopping experience.
customer_reviews.text: My husband broke the face on his phone and we are under contract. Needed a replacement quickly..you had exactly what we wanted and it was exactly as Advertised! Will shop here again.

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life isn't the best, but that is my only issue. The web speed is superfast. The camera, music player, and video are excellent, and the phone quality is good. Some say they can't always hear me, but I'm not sure the phone is the reason or just their phones suck. lol I love this so much I will keep it till it no longer works.

customer_reviews.text: Started giving me trouble at the beginning of use, stopped working within days-weeks of use! Not worth buying, I wouldn't advice anyone to purchase this phone!!!!!!!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.text: the description said minor scratches on the screen, it lied, it had no scratched, its pretty much new, i am very satisfied, also the shipping was quick to. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Motorola Droid Razr from iSpinMobile. It arrived quickly, and although it was a used product, it appeared to be in brand new condition. I was very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: BUYING A USED PHONE
customer_reviews.text: It met the purpose for what I needed it for. The phone worked well and I'm pretty happy with it until I'm ready to purchase a brand new one.

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels
customer_reviews.text: >Got the phone >charged it >works fine >screen has two dead pixels >4/5

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Because I have to return this phone but they made my return very easy and they also found the right phone for me

customer_reviews.text: Horrific battery life marred my overall experience. Would have been an awesome phone...... If the battery didn't die in an hour.

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome!!!! Best phone I have had after 7 phone I been through with Verizon.I recommended this phone!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Phones were missing some accessories.

We did not receive ear buds. We did not receive sim cards and had to buy our own. The pictures in the ad showed all the accessories we did not receive.

customer_reviews.title: Promise of good quality was correct!
customer_reviews.text: It came in perfect shape and with all the promised equipment. My husband has been very pleased and it works great!

customer_reviews.title: my droid x
customer_reviews.text: I cant talk in private because i can only hear someone on the phone while its on speaker i would like one that dosent have problem

customer_reviews.title: crappy
customer_reviews.text: This is just a really crappy phone. My screen messed up within a week and my battery does not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: raina

customer_reviews.title: A+ ONLY if you get a $40-$70 savings...  If not = F-
customer_reviews.text: Battery sucks. Search the internet and you will find most argee. The 'solution' to the battery problem of a battery injector piece MOTOROLA provides, makes the phone an A+. BUT.... you have to pay the $40-$70 for the charger. Summary: If you get a good deal on the phone used, (Saving more than $40-70), get it and plan on getting the external charger; you'll need it.
customer_reviews.author: scott a.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the box and plugged my phone in. Faceplate fell off the phone and it does not keep a charge.

customer_reviews.title: thanks
customer_reviews.text: I was satisfied, phone looked good, I got it quickly. Phone hasn't giving me any problems. Good job! :-) :-)

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: The phone has dark spots in the screen when yge brightness is all the way down and the battery will not hold its charge so it is forcing me to get a battery case for my phone, other than that I like the phone I like the 4g lte capability because it is a lot faster than mg old phone and the interface is pretty well other than the fact that the phone doesn't hold its charge its a pretty good phone. Would I reccomend this phone to somebody? Yes but not a used phone like the seller offers

customer_reviews.title: It arrived very fast and good condition,and I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these cases one for my daughter and one for my nephew they both loved the case

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: this phone was better than advertised. It had no scratches and works like brand new. It came with everything in the description and delivered very fast.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The price was very reasonable for everything it came with. I received everything that was listed and it was in excellent shape!

customer_reviews.title: Great phone

customer_reviews.title: replacement for a broken razr
customer_reviews.text: Fast with good reception. Incredible battery capacity lasts two days between charging. Size is just right fits in pocket with being uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty reluctant to buy another phone from an individual after getting burned the last time, but I did it anyway. I'm SO thankful this guy was honest!!!! The phone was actually better than described and works great! That's all I cared about was that it worked. My son is happy and not bugging me anymore and that's worth its weight in gold! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Becky W

customer_reviews.title: it was ok
customer_reviews.text: navigation app was missing and it still had photos from previous owner and stuff from other folders ..volume doesnt work soemtimes
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: would buy from them again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected, and was in nearly new condition. Great variety on options for colors, and with the savings I was able to buy a superb case and multiple screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: alan chairez

customer_reviews.title: Fast service
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast, the phone was new as advertized and works great. The one thing they could do is tell you that it does not come with a sim card and for Page Plus you have to buy separate.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good Device
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace one that I had broken.New phone works as expected. Delivery was quick. I continue to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: My wifes previous droid fell off the car and was run over.
customer_reviews.text: This phone works as advertised and was a replacement for my wifes identicale phone. No problems. put old phones sim card in and the phone worked immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good product delivered fast
customer_reviews.text: We bought this phone to replace an LG that was starting to fail to charge. This phone is a good and solid Android platform, without question. Initially I was apprehensive about getting this phone from this vendor, but the positive reviews are spot on. We got the phone we wanted from AppleWireless, in great condition, faster than I would have expected. What's not to like.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Clutts

customer_reviews.title: Nervousness turned to Happiness
customer_reviews.text: I've never ordered a refurbished phone before and had some reservations at first. I did not want to lose my unlimited plan and went ahead with the purchase. I couldn't have been more happy with the phone! It looked almost new. No scratches and has been working like advertised. I'm not sure if all of the phones coming from them are like this, but I am very pleased with the phone I bought and will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hilgert

customer_reviews.title: got wrong phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone was listed as a Razr Maax but I received a Razr. I Purchased this phone for the battery life, but now I'm back to the same as my old Bionic.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this phone for my daughter and she loves it. Easy to use, very nice phone. I might get one for me too in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Gegee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone works very well. It was a good buy. I would recommend this phone battery last 2 days easy.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Rogers

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son and he loves this phone! came in great shape as well as promised. would get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a RAZR MAXX with a broken screen.
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, it works just like the MAXX did, but with a shorter battery life. I spend my life near computers and wall sockets, so the battery life is not a major concern anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Neededa replacement quick like. I work nights, and placed this order at around 2am, received text around 9am saying it has shipped. Very impressed, not easy to do. Received a day early. Was very pleased. Phone was as described. Would do business with them again!
customer_reviews.author: ipman

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Was not in the condition stated. can only hear calls when on speaker phone. Headphone jack had gunk in it and does not work. Vibration works when it wants to. All in all phone was in very bad condtion.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod White

customer_reviews.title: good phone in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: The phone was everything I was hoping it would be. The only thing was they sent the wrongs SIMs card which was not a problem cause Verizon gave me a new card for free when I activated the phone. So in all I was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: lindsayjosh09

customer_reviews.title: Everything went smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product, service and price. Couldn't have been better! Thanks for the new phone I love it and won't go swimming with this one.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with service.
customer_reviews.text: The phone was supposed to be refurbished, when it came it said used. I was also charged 156 for the phone and the invoice came and said it was $109. Not happy with phone. It freezes up and it comes on in forgeign language.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Siers

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new Droid RAZR phone, I am very happy with my purchase. The phone came with it's original box, usb/wall charger and an SD card - which I appreciate the additional memory storage. I am very please with the order and delivery process as well, everything was smooth and I received my item way before my expected delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: *Karin*

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Good phone. Came without a Sim card so I had to buy one. Phone was used so there were clear signs of wear & tear. Usb cable that came with it is very worn and doesn't work when plugging in to a computer. Had to buy another one. oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Rmm

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone in (brand new) condition and when i got it it was scratched up and the bottom right corner had a huge crack in it. i paid the 300$ for a new phone and got a used beat up phone.

customer_reviews.text: The phone works by 10/0 Battery not working permanently in addition to damage to the screen and there is no camera

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Not Authentic! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Defective. Not as described...."manufacturers overstock"....nope. Warranty doesnt exist & this phone doesnt work & seller will disregard problem. Only gave 1 star because 0 wasnt an option. Unfortunate situation for the authentic sellers bc customers like myself lose trust in purchasing phone products when you get a junk phone! I wont ever buy from anyone else again besides the cell phone store or Amazon.com.

customer_reviews.title: beware knock OFF items

customer_reviews.author: lesley evans

customer_reviews.title: Junk Battery
customer_reviews.text: Ive had 3 of these phones prior to this unit, and have loved them. This phone would only hold a charge about 3-4 hours. I contacted the seller, they said if I shipped it back they would evaluate it and possibly replace. I would buy a different phone next time, Ive had it for a few months and hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Grizo

customer_reviews.title: it was okay. not what I thought..
customer_reviews.text: It was ok! I had to resale it because the battery life was only 6 hours. But the phone looked brand new but it was refurbished(used) and I thought it wasn't according to what the discribition said. And i talk to the person who sold it to me and they took forever to reply so I just sold it myself..but the phone wasn't my favorite item.

customer_reviews.title: Same as RAZR MAXX but battery is half the copacity
customer_reviews.text: Great android phone. Better one would be Razr MAXX. Exactly the same but with bigger battery that would last for days. Razr MAXX cost about the same so dont waste your money unless you have no problem charging your phone every day
customer_reviews.author: Tonycstech

customer_reviews.title: Was a little afraid to purchase this
customer_reviews.text: Because a phone I had recently bought was faulty so I wasn't sure how this would turn out, I received the phone sealed in box with everything needed and I was able to swap my sim card right over and within 1 minute it was up and running. I love this phone I would recommend this seller to anyone in fact we recently bought another phone from them. Thank you for great products.
customer_reviews.author: risingabove

customer_reviews.title: 50 more bucks
customer_reviews.text: Suppose to have been in excellent condition which to me it was unpected by Cellual direct and the privacy speaker didn't work from the get go and then it developed a crack in the led screen under gorilla glass screen 3 day before the 30 was over and I had to pay the another $50 for them to replace the phone it was OK I guess .
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Gill

customer_reviews.title: I was excited about the phone but...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about the phone, I liked everything about the phone itself. If you are not planning on getting a contract with a carrier this phone is not for you. It cannot be activated on any prepaid plans, because it is a 4g phone, and it not compatible with any prepaid including Page Plus. Only with a credit check or contract.
customer_reviews.author: Malika B

customer_reviews.title: The phone that I purchased is a good phone. But it is out dated n out ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone that I purchased is a good phone. But it is out dated n out of warranty by 2 yrs. So not knowing that I had purchased 1 phone after another until I called Motorola 2 find out that the phone was out dated. Once my apps were in stalled they wouldn't respond. It got 2 b very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: DaleBowers

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these phones before.They are awsome! Watch movies off Netflix with a HDMI cable purchased seperately on my TV. Luckily I still have truely unlimited data with verizon. Pay cash for phones and never renew contract.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Waddell

product_meta.title: Motorola RAZR XT912 Black Verizon Wireless
product_meta.description: Motorola has revived their RAZR brand with this Android enabled Droid RAZR smartphone. This is one of the thinnest 4G LTE smartphones in the market and comes sporting a 4.3-inch qHD display, 16GB storage, 1.2 GHz dual-core processor, 8-megapixel camera, 1080p HD video recording, front-facing camera, and support for PC-like dock accessories. In addition to other features such as WiFi, GPS navigation, multi-format music player, Bluetooth compatibility, and full web browser, the Droid RAZR features scratch resistant and water repellent Gorilla Glass display and kevlar back. Use this device to access thousands of apps, games, books, movies, and music on the Google Play Store.
feature_bullets: This product has been extensively tested, is certified to be 100% functional, and ready for activation
This offer includes battery and wall charger
